title: How use the Mute On/Mute Off function during a  call?
answer:
The Mic of the mobile phone can be enabled or disabled through this function. The Mute On function prevents the other party from hearing your voice.
Enable Mute: During a call, press the left soft key to enter the menu and select Mute.
Disable Mute: During a call, press the left soft  key to enter the menu and undo the selection of Mute.
